mapper.select: select ch.houseId,ch.customerId,c.name name_c,c.phone,unix_timestamp(ch.createDate)*1000 createDate, ch.zoneId,z.name name_z,ch.houseInfo,ch.houseLocation,ch.callbackTips, ch.houseTypeId,hs.name name_s,ch.isNew,ch.area,ch.designType,ch.status, ch.budgetId,b.name name_b,ch.hasSoft,ch.comment,ch.log,ch.gift, ch.giftAddress,c.customerCode from customer_house ch left join zone z on ch.zoneId=z.zoneId left join house_style hs on hs.styleId=ch.houseTypeId left join budget b on b.budgetId=ch.budgetId left join customer c on c.customerId=ch.customerId where 1=1 and c.serviceId=#{serviceId} and ch.status !=0 order by ch.houseId
